quotes.quote: You have the nicest window, you know? None of the others can even compete. It's not flashy like the others, or bleary—your window gives off this nice, quiet light.
The windows of the houses – even if the house is ramshackle – are always beautiful because windows represent light!
The window of opportunity opens and closes as fast as a camera's shutter.
If you want the people to understand you, invite them to your life and let them see the world from your window!
All the windows of my heart I open to the day.
There is a window from one heart to another heart.
The windows of my soul I throw wide open to the sun.
Open the window of your mind. Allow the fresh air, new lights and new truths to enter.
Enlarge your windows till you get a window where you can see the whole universe with one look!
My favorite journey is looking out the window.
A breeze, a forgotten summer, a smile, all can fit into a storefront window.
Set wide the window. Let me drink the day.
It is not possible for a house to own a spirit without owning windows with flowers!
Throw open your window and let the scenery of clouds and sky enter your room!
The window of her sadness was so vast that it almost opened a path to her soul.
I feel that it is healthier to look out at the world through a window than through a mirror. Otherwise, all you see is yourself and whatever is behind you.
When I look out my window / Many sights to see / And when I look in my window / So many different people to be / That it's strange, so strange.
I let fall the windows of mine eyes.
Your eyes are windows to your dreams; Your ears are windows to your mind; You nose is the door to your heart you can win over any man with just your smell.
The windows of my soul are made of one way glass, don't bother looking into my eyes If there's something you want to know just ask.
If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade.
I removed the window because, while I used to spend all my time looking out through windows wishing to be outside, I now live there all the time.
A window covered with raindrops interests me more than a photograph of a famous person.
Better keep yourself clean and bright; you are the window through which you must see the world.
In my head there are several windows, that I do know, but perhaps it is always the same one, open variously on the parading universe.
We are all prisoners but some of us are in cells with windows and some without.
From the same window, you keep seeing the same view!
Don't waste a minute not being happy. If one window closes, run to the next window or break down a door.
If it's reality you want, I suggest you look out the window.
Rich windows that exclude the light, And passages that lead to nothing.
